 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָעָה‎</span> **verb** ==sweep together== (with collateral idea of ***carrying away***) (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhIwAbAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAjABsAAAJXjI+py+0PIwNUNgoOxjbtrHGdB3rjiabqKm3s8pVvUBmyvdawfop0yOvFbD6TIvZBJI874CWII90e0N/RBYFWl47tVPkFf6vEcPlZGu6Ka3Xbwp3J55ECADs="> is ***collect, gather***) — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיָעָה‎</span> consecutive [[Isa.28.17|Isa 28:17]] subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּרָד‎</span> with accusative (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַחְסֵה כָזָב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ויעה ב‎</span>). **\*\***Compare also Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***vessel*** [[Gen.42.25|Gen 42:25]] Saad, compare Baldensperger<sup>PEF 1904, 53,</sup> who compares Modern Arabic <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***wa±â***</u></abbr> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">).
